full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BLO RIGS KYI SDOM TSIG BLANG DOR GSAL BA'I ME LONG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B SMRAS PA, BLO GROS ZHI BA MOS BLANG DOR GYI, ,BLO YI SPU RIS 'BYED PA'I PHYIR, ,BLO RIGS SDOM TSIG MDOR BSDUS 'DI, ,BLO BZANG MING CAN ZHIG GIS BKOD, ,'DIR 'BAD DGE BAS 'GRO BA KUN, ,LEGS NYES LTA BA'I MIG PHYE NAS, ,MA NOR LAM BZANG MTHAR PHYIN TE, ,KUN MKHYEN GO 'PHANG MYUR THOB SHOG , ,,(TSUL 'DI LHAG BSAM DGE BA CAN, ,DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG BZOD PA YIS, ,MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR TE PAR DU BSGRUBS, ,'DIS MTSON DUS GSUM DGE BA'I MTHUS, ,TSE 'DI'I PHA MAS THOG DRANGS PA'I, ,MKHA' NYAM 'GRO BA MA LUS, ,DAL 'BYOR RTEN BZANG RIM BRGYUD NAS, ,SKU GSUM GO 'PHANG MYUR THOB SHOG , ,,)
